评论详情: Good workout bra. got it in a size small but wish i got it in a x small. Not very supportive but i think it’s because it was too big.

I love this bra I got it In different colors. It’s sturdy, comfy and supportive even with the pads out. Only thing I’d suggest is not to place it in the dryer as it feels like it has shrunk a tad bit since I got it but overall I love it.

This is my new go to for sports bras! I choose this brand over my Lululemon sports bras every chance I get. They hold in place without being too tight. Straps are comfortable. I can wear it for HIIT work outs or just everyday wear. Color is bold and it keeps it’s color and hold after many washes.

I love these sports bras! I have them in almost every color. They’re much more affordable than Lululemon’s version. These are a great knockoff from Lululemon’s. Their true to size and I like that you can take the padding out too.,
Everything awesome padding, color,strap Adjustment,and hold.All together awesome Bra.
Was ok was super big if ur an xs and can’t size down don’t buy
Love the color and hold of this bra. Sizing was a little off . Has good stretch and padding.
Perfect lulu dupe. This has held up longer than my lulu & had s tad but more coverage. I would size down though

It’s really flattering and holds well. You could wear it plain the to gym or use it under some shirts. I paired it with a lace long sleeve and overalls. However, the sides can dig in and be very itchy and uncomfortable.

I was preparing myself to possibly get a low quality, awkward fitting bra. Surprisingly it fit perfectly. I have also never owned a sports bra that I could easily put on and take off. The cups are removable, but unlike other bras, they feel sturdy and the bra structured. I was nervous the thin straps would snap during pilates, but it held up perfectly and was super comfortable. No bulging, no nips showing. Excellent overall, even better than those I tried in stores. I ordered two more in other colors, and may order more if they also work well. In a way, I like that there are no strap adjusters because it doesn't poke or pinch when you lay flat on your back during exercise. I followed the Amazon suggestion of getting large, and it was the perfect size.
So comfy, great with tank tops

I am a small-chested lady (32 A/B), 5' 5" 130 lb, and usually wear small/medium. I bought a MEDIUM and it was too tight! The overall design is nice, but I can't imagine a Large is going to fit right either. Had to return.
Bought a medium, sent back. Large fit. Removed pads. Good coverage.
This bra was uncomfortable and pokes you right under your armpits. I tried putting tape in those places and that helped a bit but I ended up getting rid of it because of how uncomfortable it was.
the padding was a tad bit bulky but i took it out and absolutely loved the look and feel of this bra!
I have this bra is 3 colors and love them! They are identical to the lulu version and are super soft and comfortable. The straps are thin and the Y cut is really flattering!
This brand is great. Soft and similar to Lulu. Runs true to size.
I love this sports bra so much. I have it in every color. Super cute and does a good job for low/medium impact workouts. I think it runs a little small so I would size up.

This bra is just like some with a lot more $$$ attached. It is so comfortable. The pads stay put even with multiple washes. I wear this bra at least 3x per week. The only thing I would mention is i am a smaller chested person, 36B, that usually needs a M/L in tops and the medium was preffered over the L. I have both.

I usually wear a size Medium or Large. I went a size up for comfort. I purchased a size Large in the beige color. I love this sports bra. It is very soft, the thickness is great and the support pads are made well too. I would definitely purchase this product again. I am 5'4, 140-150 lbs with an athletic build.

评论概述: Soft, Comfortable, and Perfect for Low-Impact Workouts!
评论详情: This Y-back sports bra is one of my daily go-to bras, period. The wearability is amazing—it’s very soft, very comfortable, and perfect for activities like yoga or walking. The light padding is removable, providing just the right amount of shape while still feeling natural.  The thin straps make it flattering and ideal for low-impact workouts, and the medium coverage is great for everyday wear. I’d definitely recommend sizing up for a perfect fit. It’s incredibly versatile and feels comparable to a high-priced brand, but at a fraction of the cost.  If you’re looking for a stylish, functional, and affordable sports bra, I highly recommend this one!
Lo pedí según la tabla de medidas que se muestra pero me quedo grande y no se puede ajustar a la medida. El color y el material excelente
This sports bra is exactly like the name brand lululemon bra. It is so comfortable and fits the exact same. Super flattering as well.
This bra is unmatched! It is so comfortable and buttery and supportive. I want to live in this top. I literally cannot recommend it enough.

评论概述: Comfy sports bra for exercise or lunging
评论详情: Bought this to workout in but i find myself lounging around the house in it. Great for low impact workout but if you have a busy larger than a C, i would buy something with larger straps.
Great quality true to size
Tight around straps but not compact around chest

评论概述: Great for athletes with large backs
评论详情: Amazing! Bought one and loved it so much that I bought 2 more

The navy color is definitely a true navy color. GREAT alternative to the expensive Lululemon bras. I would say that they fit true-to-size. I consistently work out with mine and have bought more colors!
love these!

Big chest girly who finds it very difficult finding bras which means I’m usually in a sports bra, this one is great so far no complaints at all! I chose size medium and as you can see my girls who are usually towards the floor are nice and UP, also with very minimal/to no leakage on the sides! I wasn’t aware it came padded but again no complaints here, I actually find it to be very comfortable. I couldn’t put 5 stars yet because I haven’t wore it outside and for a few hours yet to see how it holds but I will wear a few times and come back and update.

If this bra had been true-to-size, I would have given it 5 stars.  But it runs extremely small.  I am 5' 7" and 155 lbs.  I ordered a large.  I am not busty at all, but this bra was so tight and smashed me so flat I felt very uncomfortable.  I am returning it and I have reordered an XL.  So that tells you that other than the sizing, I really like this bra.  I will come back and update when I receive the XL.UPDATE: Ok, so I ordered the XL.  Still way too tight!  It is going back as well.
Loved this! Fit perfect (it’s low support, which is what I wanted), soft and buttery. Going to order more!

This has been my favorite bra all year and I just bought another one since mine is always in the wash. It is very comfortable, very flattering, very supportive - it washes and dries well. I am super pleased with the quality and everything. I find myself wearing this under normal blouses as a bra, and not just as a workout bra. I especially like the cup pads in this, they hold their shape wash after wash and stay in place within the pocket.
This item is identical to the lululemon flow Y bra!! Love !!!
Such a good price and just like the lululemon sports bra
I’m a 36 DD and i feel like the straps are too thin for big breast women.

I have more on the bigger size boobs but I got a medium cus I like my bras snug. Fits great around my boobs but the straps are a little too long. Just wouldn't wear for a run or high impact workout otherwise fine for everyday.
This smelled horrible (chemical like) straight out of the bag. I've tried washing it three times but the smell won't go away. I'm scared to wear it.

The bra I received was stretch and it was very comfortable when I first tried it on. I then noticed the padding in the bra was lopsided, and made me look like I had bumpy boobs. I’m still using the product now that I removed the padding, but I’m disappointed in the product that I assumed I would be getting from these photos. Also, now when I wear it it chafes under my arms, causing discomfort.

this bra feels and looks like a high end workout clothing line. it is supportive (more support if you size down one) and looks great. i bought same color leggings to wear as a set and it looks great. great value!
I ordered new, it came damaged.
Absolutely love these! Love the color, comfort, & fit of these bras. Bought them in multiple colors.

This style is my preference but I was disappointed in how the bottom support hikes up in the back. I have large breasts which may play a role. But a similar style from born primitive has served well, just more expensive.

I ordered this for my granddaughter, and when I opened the packaging, it is evident that someone wore this and got white deodorant marks on it. Easily seen in person, and every woman knows those marks for what they are.  Very disappointed.
These are so soft and exactly as Described. Would recommend if you like Lululemon but don’t like their prices. :)
My new favorite sports bra! Light weight but still has enough support. True to size. I ended up buying 3 more because I love!!!!
These are so great. So soft! Straps are fine but wish they were adjustable.
I really like how soft this is.
Really great for those razor back workout tops.

This sports bra is very comfortable, like butter. Sometimes I forget I’m wearing it. It’s perfect for working out and you can even sleep in it because it’s so comfortable. Only thing is you have to readjust the removable pads after you wash but it’s not that annoying.
Awesome quality
Not a lot of support if you are biggger chested Will work better for lounging
Soft!

I cannot express enough how much I love this brand. I have not bought anything I wouldn’t rate less than 5 stars from them. They quality is always 10/10 the delivery is fast even when something is out of stock and the color range is amazing. The support from these sports bras is great and the fabric is very soft just like lulu (maybe even better).
It feels good when worn, is soft, and has a cute design
I had been looking for a brown work out set so I got the color taupe I’m 5’1 122 lbs and I got the size small and it fit perfectly I’m just waiting on the leggings now.

When I first put it on it felt really good. It was very soft. After wearing it for several hours the band under my armpit starts to hurt. It also leaves imprints because of the way they stitched the seam. They made where the fabric comes together like double the thickness of the rest of it. Just seems like an odd way of finishing the seam. May size up next time so it doesn't hurt me as much. Other than that great product. Would buy again
I was really hoping to like this sports bra, but one of the padding was bent and bumpy, which can be seen through my top. Returned.
The elastic around the chest is really stiff and the neckline gapes open if you have a small chest or narrower upper body.

I LOVE this brand. I have so many of their leggings and sports bras! I was excited to find this cool green tie dye pattern and couldn't wait to wear it to spin class... About 3 minutes into class I was SO uncomfortable because my chest was bouncing all over the place lol And I am not large chested by any means. This style of sports bra just isn't meant for control, imo. It's cute! But I wouldn't plan on wearing it when running, spinning, or any other exercises where you'll be bouncing up and down  :-[
Love this bra already ordered in multiple colors I would say I’m a D and I got a size large . Fits good true to size would size up for more support .
So so comfy and cute!
SSuper comfy and I paired with leggings - love that matchy set. Great quality and color exactly like on the picture.
I am a nurse and workout regularly and these sports bras have begun to be my favorites! They are very comfortable, soft, and don’t rub under my arms during workouts like some I’ve had in the past do!
The fabric is nice- it's a little confining over all, like too much elasticity. The padding is big as well. Not full coverage on the sides
Smaller than expected

I bought this sports bra because I had heard it was a good dupe for the Lulu ones! They were totally right!  I love these and have had this one for a little over 6 months.  It is holding up very well.  Only con is the inserts in the sports bra need flipped around after being in the washing machine.  I think I have bought this in every single color they have to offer.  I am small chested so they give me pretty good support.
I have the lululemon sports bra that this is a dupe of and I honestly like this one better. It’s very soft and has good support. Would recommend this brand over lululemon any day.

Really good lululemon flow y bra dupe. The only downside to this is that the band is a lil big. It still fits and holds everything in place while working out, I just wish it was a tad bit tighter. Overall, this is a great sports bra! Super comfortable wnd flattering!
Fits really good, supportive and looks like photo! Quality is good and does the job!
Super comfy, removable pads, cute straps in the back
Fit perfect Excellent bra

I have tried several sports bras over the years and this one is by far my favorite. The material is amazing and so soft and comfortable. It offers the perfect amount of support. Definitely will be purchasing again!

First, the positives: The fit is good and snug as a medium compression sports bra should be. Stays in place well, I love the color and the material is soft and has a sturdy feel to it. I’m allowed to move in any position without it binding or rolling up. I love the straps - very comfortable as well. The color is bright and cheery.  Now, the downside - I took the pads out as they were stiff and my breasts felt squished in them. They are thick but I feel much better without them. It’s really my only gripe, if you will. Overall, there’s a lot more positive than negative and the negative was easy to rectify.
I luv Crz Yoga! Their sports bra’s are so soft and comfortable. The perfect fit and so flattering. I have multiple from this brand in multiple styles.
idk if its just me but I had to return just because it was super tight, ill definitely repurchase soon in a size up! quality is great though.
Ended up returning this product. The cups felts hard, were uncomfortable and the shape was u flattering.

评论概述: cute but if you need support don’t expect it from this bra!
评论详情: it’s a cute style but the fact you can’t adjust the straps leaves those with bigger chests with not a lot of support and can kind of contradict the use of a sports bra.
Bought in 4 colors and I took out the padding cuz it made my boobs looks weird. Once removed it fit great. Soft and comfy. Low impact so not a lot of support.
This is AMAZING 🤩 i love this bra so much! It is super comfortable and supportive + a good 🤑 price!
Comfortable

This bra is one of my favorites from this company. I have it in five colors. It is very low impact however so it you bigger chested I would just keep in mind its not ideal for cardio however it works great for light activity or weight lifting. I am size 34B and fit in a medium perfectly. I don't have any issues with it staying up. However, whenever I lean over, it tends to show a little bit but everything stays in place and its still super cute. Highly recommend.

So I originally purchased a size L because I followed the size chart and that is what it suggested. I have an extremely broad back and smaller cup size. I found the L to be a little too tight, leaving red marks around my back, so I ordered the same exact bra in an XL. Unfortunately, I do not feel any size difference between the L and the XL. If you are like me and have a very broad back, this might not be the bra for you. Other than that, it very soft and stylish!
Easy to put on and take off. Good coverage and decent fit. There’s no strap adjustment but I personally prefer that. Taking three of these to boot camp with me
I now own almost every color in these, hands down my favorite sports bra I’ve ever tried, weightless yet support.  So comfortable and soft material!!

Although I love this style, if you have big boobs, DO NOT BUY. It's an okay bra for just lounging around, but the moment I did anything, I had zero support. Also, because the straps were so small, a lot of weight was pulled down, and the straps would dig into my neck and sides. I also had a lot of side spillage, which isn't favorable.
Just add to chart in several colors, you won't be mad you did.  Fits TTS, worth the investment.

Measurements suggested a large would be the right size, the band fit but it's overall so loose it offers no support as a bra. I wasn't expecting underwire level of lift but I was expecting the elastic to be more firm/sturdy to offer support for the bra. There is padding similar to a bathing suit inside, not sure how that would have held up with washes. 3 stars because color was nice and maybe if you need a smaller bra/less support during workouts it might work.

Love these bras. They are super comfortable, the material is skin friendly and breathable, they stretch with you as you move. Such a good shape and they are padded. Now I just need them in more colors!
Soft, size medium true to size. Lots of colors.

But not great. The padding is ill-fitting and I usually remove my Lulu ones anyway, but this bra without padding the inside stitching becomes visible under light: there are two lines in the middle which look weird and distracting. It is more forgiving in darker colors. I bought it in white and navy. Otherwise fabric and fit are comfortable. I bought XS - I wear Lulu 6 or S in Asia Fit, 32C, the fit is slightly on the large side without padding but acceptable. I’ll keep these but not sure if I’ll order more…

This is a good bra, well made, holds ya in real good.  Just size up for around the bust.  It's a little tight there and I think that could've been resolved if I went a size up.  Other than that this bra is great.
LOVED before washing…but after one wash the product ripped and was ruined. So, so sad.
soft, supportive, perfect dupe for the Lulu bra.  Would totally buy again.
Love these super comfy great price and durable!!
Very comfortable. The fabric is very nice and thick like the "expensive" ones. Bought more in different colors and styles!

评论概述: I love the style, but the design needs a little work
评论详情: I love the color and the style, but the cups and the waist need work. The cups seem too big for the bra, and the are a bit stiff and can take on not the most flattering shape. And when did sports bras start becoming your really stiff restricting band? Maybe it's personal, but I prefer the more flexible softer waist on sports bras that aren't a sewn in piece of elastic. I haven't needed to replace a sports bra in a couple years so maybe I missed the transition, but I'm frustrated. As somebody who suffers from chronic pain, I can't handle a waist band that's too tight. I kept it because I didn't want to pay more than the price and it's the same band I'm finding at Walmart and Target. But disappointed. Would like to have some options from every brand. I like the styles and colors from this brand, just would like to have options for the waist band and definitely needs work on the cups.
this came as an order part of one!!
I like the color and coverage of this sports bra. I feel like the thinner straps don’t offer as much support as I’d like but overall I’d recommend it because of the comfort.
